'''Romantropologie: Essays over antropologie en literatuur''' (Dutch: ''Novel anthropology: essays on anthropology in literature'') is a Dutch-language book.

[[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is treated in the contribution by Willem de Blécourt: "De antropologië van Faërie: enkele beschouwingen over het werk van J.R.R. Tolkien".<ref>[[Åke Bertenstam|Bertenstam, Åke]]: ''[http://www.forodrim.org/bibliography/tolklist.html A Chronological Bibliography of Books About Tolkien]''</ref>
